name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. David SHADDING, Petitioner

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 2Srd day of June, 2009, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
Justice GREENSPAN did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
